entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
